headline: Val, a new programing language inspired by Swift and Rust
description:
Dave Abrahams and Dimitri Racordon from Swift and C++ fame, announced during their quite interesting keynote for language geeks at C++Now 2022, a new programming language based on a mix of Swift and Rust ideas, with main focus on being value based and generics

The somehow lenghty keynote (3h), that introduces the background ideas leading up to the language, and the language itself,

"A Future of Value Semantics and Generic Programming"

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Ri8bly-dJs

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GsxYnEAZoNI&

If you want to skip it and go straight to the source, it is located at,

https://github.com/val-lang/val
headline_zh-Hans: Val，一种受Swift和Rust启发的新编程语言
headline_zh-Hant: Val，一種受Swift和Rust啟發的新編程語言
description_zh-Hans:
来自Swift和C++的Dave Abrahams和Dimitri Racordon在2022年C++Now大会上为语言爱好者宣布了一种基于Swift和Rust混合思想的新编程语言，主要重点是基于价值和泛型

这篇冗长的主题演讲（3小时），介绍了该语言的背景思想，以及该语言本身。

"价值语义和泛型编程的未来"

https://www。 youtube.com/watch?v=4Ri8bly-dJs

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GsxYnEAZoNI&

如果你想跳过它而直接进入源头，它位于，

https://github.com/val-lang/val
description_zh-Hant:
來自Swift和C++的Dave Abrahams和Dimitri Racordon在2022年C++Now大會上為語言愛好者宣佈了一種基於Swift和Rust混合思想的新編程語言，主要重點是基於價值和泛型

這篇冗長的主題演講（3小時），介紹了該語言的背景思想，以及該語言本身。

"價值語義和泛型編程的未來"

https://www。 youtube.com/watch?v=4Ri8bly-dJs

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GsxYnEAZoNI&

如果你想跳過它而直接進入源頭，它位於，

https://github.com/val-lang/val
